Package com.sonic.as_storage_java

Interface Summary
AS_Storage_EventListener.DeviceEventListener Interface client overrides to provide device Callback info
AS_Storage_EventListener.VolumeEventListener Interface client overrides to provide volume callback info
 

Class Summary
AS_Storage_EventListener This class provides interfaces for client to override event listeners.
AS_Storage_JavaEvent This class manages all of the event handling functions.
Audio This class manages all of the audio related functions.
Device This class manages all of the device related functions.
Format This class manages all of the volume format related functions.
PropertySheet This class manages all of the property related functions for each of the APIs.
RTFile This class manages all of the file related functions.
SDKProperties This class manages all of the sdk related properties.
StorageError This class manages error codes for API functions
Volume This class manages all of the volume related functions.
 

Enum Summary
AS_Storage_JavaEvent.JavaEventType This enumerates the types of notifications available
Audio.EffectType Audio effects that may be applied for creation or extraction
Audio.FileType Supported audio file types (used also for streaming)
Audio.Track_Property Audio-specific properties that may be set for creation
Device.DeviceState This enumerates the valid states the device state query can return.
Device.DevProp_Type This enumerates the properties which can be queried and/or set for the device.
Device.Erase_Type This enumerates the types of device erase which can be performed.
Device.Event_Type This enumerates the types of notifications available for device and media
Device.ExclusiveAccess_Type This enumerates the access types for exclusive access.
Device.MediaProp_Type This enumerates the properties which can be queried and/or set for the media.
Device.SetCallbackType This enumerates the device notification register/unregister controls
Device.TrackProp_Type This enumerates the properties which can be queried and/or set for the tracks.
Device.TrayControls This enumerates the tray controls which can be set.
Format.FormatProperty Properties of AS_Format Objects
RTFile.OpenMode This enumerates the open modes available for OpenFile
RTFile.Property This enumerates the properties available to query and set.
SDKProperties.SettingType General SDK settings which can be run to customize environment
Volume.BootType This enumerates the volume bootable image types
Volume.Content_Protection_Type This enumerates the Protection values of the volume
Volume.Flush_Border_Options This enumerates the Border options passed into Flush - caller is REQUIRED to specify one of these border options
Volume.Format_Type This enumerates the High-level format types
Volume.Info This enumerates parameters returned through the client callback method.
Volume.Property This enumerates the volume properties which can be retrieved and set
